General.Name: Goldhills Holding Ltd
General.Description: Goldhills Holding Ltd., an exploration stage company, engages in the exploration of mineral properties in Canada. The company was formerly known as Greatbanks Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Goldhills Holding Ltd. in September 2019. Goldhills Holding Ltd. was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 400 - 837 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3N6
